author: FOX Sports North
title: Local sports broadcasters launch Feed the Cities - Voices of Minnesota Sports
description: Through the initiative, fans are encouraged to request video messages from Minnesota sports broadcasters
content: Local broadcasters from the Minnesota Wild, United, Twins, Vikings, Timberwolves and Lynx in conjunction with FOX Sports North and KFAN launched Feed the Cities – Voices of Minnesota Sports. Through the initiative, fans are encouraged to request video message… [+4669 chars]
